```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)

run_dr_ate <- function(df,
                       outcome_var = "taltb",
                       treat_var   = "temp",
                       covars,
                       B    = 300,
                       seed = 156,
                       ps_trim = c(0.01, 0.99)) {
  # 1. Main analysis sample (same as IPW pipeline)
  dat <- make_ipw_sample3(df)
  
  # 2. Build outcome (same definition as for IPW)
  dat$y401k_ipw <- make_ipw_outcome3(dat, outcome_var)
  
  # 3. Check covariates exist
  missing_covars <- setdiff(covars, names(dat))
  if (length(missing_covars) > 0) {
    stop(
      "These covariates are not in the data: ",
      paste(missing_covars, collapse = ", ")
    )
  }
  
  # 4. Filter to complete cases in treatment, outcome, and covariates
  dat_complete <- dat %>%
    filter(
      !is.na(.data[[treat_var]]),
      !is.na(y401k_ipw)
    ) %>%
    tidyr::drop_na(all_of(covars))
  
  if (nrow(dat_complete) == 0) {
    stop(
      "After filtering for non-missing treatment, outcome, and covariates, ",
      "no observations remain."
    )
  }
  
  # Rename for convenience
  Z <- dat_complete[[treat_var]]
  Y <- dat_complete$y401k_ipw
  
  # 5. Propensity score model
  rhs_terms <- c("tage", "I(tage^2)", setdiff(covars, "tage"))
  rhs       <- paste(rhs_terms, collapse = " + ")
  ps_formula <- as.formula(paste0(treat_var, " ~ ", rhs))
  
  ps_model <- glm(ps_formula,
                  data   = dat_complete,
                  family = binomial(link = "logit"))
  
  e_hat <- predict(ps_model, type = "response")
  

  # 6. Outcome models m1(x) and m0(x)
  #    Use same covariates (no treatment in RHS)
  outcome_rhs <- paste(covars, collapse = " + ")
  m1_formula  <- as.formula(paste0("y401k_ipw ~ ", outcome_rhs))
  m0_formula  <- m1_formula
  
  m1_model <- glm(m1_formula,
                  data   = dat_complete[Z == 1, ],
                  family = gaussian())
  m0_model <- glm(m0_formula,
                  data   = dat_complete[Z == 0, ],
                  family = gaussian())
  
  m1_hat <- predict(m1_model, newdata = dat_complete, type = "response")
  m0_hat <- predict(m0_model, newdata = dat_complete, type = "response")
  
  # 7. AIPW (ATE) estimator, textbook
  # tau_hat = mean[ Z * (Y - m1)/e - (1-Z)*(Y - m0)/(1-e) + m1 - m0 ]
  tau_hat <- mean(
    Z      * (Y - m1_hat) / e_hat -
      (1-Z) * (Y - m0_hat) / (1 - e_hat) +
      (m1_hat - m0_hat)
  )
  
  # 8. Bootstrap SE and CI
  set.seed(seed)
  N <- nrow(dat_complete)
  
  boot_ests <- replicate(B, {
    idx  <- sample(seq_len(N), replace = TRUE)
    Z_b  <- Z[idx]
    Y_b  <- Y[idx]
    e_b  <- e_hat[idx]
    m1_b <- m1_hat[idx]
    m0_b <- m0_hat[idx]
    
    mean(
      Z_b      * (Y_b - m1_b) / e_b -
        (1-Z_b) * (Y_b - m0_b) / (1 - e_b) +
        (m1_b - m0_b)
    )
  })
  
  se_hat <- sd(boot_ests)
  ci_95  <- tau_hat + c(-1, 1) * 1.96 * se_hat
  
  list(
    estimate     = tau_hat,
    se           = se_hat,
    ci_95        = ci_95,
    ps_model     = ps_model,
    m1_model     = m1_model,
    m0_model     = m0_model,
    e_hat        = e_hat,
    m1_hat       = m1_hat,
    m0_hat       = m0_hat,
    covariates   = covars,
    treat_var    = treat_var,
    outcome_var  = outcome_var,
    n_obs        = N,
    boot_ests    = boot_ests,
    data_used    = dat_complete
  )
}
```

```{r}
# 1) Raw aligned
covars_raw_aligned <- c("tage", "hh_inc_year", "incmissing")

dr_raw_aligned <- run_dr_ate(
  dat_raw_aligned_ipw,
  outcome_var = "taltb",
  treat_var   = "temp",
  covars      = covars_raw_aligned
)

dr_raw_aligned$estimate
dr_raw_aligned$se
dr_raw_aligned$ci_95


# 2) Raw non-restricted
covars_raw_non <- c(
  "tage", "hh_inc_year", "incmissing",
  "educ_cat", "firm_size_cat", "industry1d", "days_on_job"
)

dr_raw_non <- run_dr_ate(
  dat_raw_ipw_non,
  outcome_var = "taltb",
  treat_var   = "temp",
  covars      = covars_raw_non
)

dr_raw_non$estimate
dr_raw_non$se
dr_raw_non$ci_95

covars_rep <- c(

)

dr_rep <- run_dr_ate(
```

```{r}
               dr_raw_non$estimate,
               dr_rep$estimate),
  se       = c(dr_raw_aligned$se,
               dr_raw_non$se,

  ci_lower = c(dr_raw_aligned$ci_95[1],
               dr_raw_non$ci_95[1],
               dr_rep$ci_95[1]),
  ci_upper = c(dr_raw_aligned$ci_95[2],
               dr_raw_non$ci_95[2],
               dr_rep$ci_95[2]),
```
